content.text: The elizaOS/eliza repository has shown significant activity over a two-day period (June 11-13, 2025). On June 11, there were 19 new PRs with 8 merged, 1 new issue, and 10 active contributors. Activity increased on June 12, with 22 new PRs (21 merged), 4 new issues, and 13 active contributors. Overall, this indicates a healthy, active project with growing contributor engagement and a high PR merge rate, particularly on the second day.

categories.title: Crypto Market Data from codexAnalytics
content: All major cryptocurrencies (WETH, SOL, WBTC, ai16z) showed a downward price trend in the latest market data.
